documents.document: Holy shit, I can't *wait* for Google to start deranking sites with popups.
@dcotterill @tirsen and I almost had a brain haemorrhage from reading the comments #neverreadthecomments
Kingpin v3-unstable now has i18n support: https://t.co/sshyVTI1FT
@hynek appreciate it and I'm glad it's useful
Want an extensible Thrift linter? I wrote one: https://t.co/xxA3nTvSCh
I guess it's not surprising, but the amount of crazy in the comment section of Julian Assange's AMA is impressive (https://t.co/oUek5qJT3u)
@bobbrownfndn Bob, I despair that there is nothing that can be done to prevent these extinctions in time. Tell me I'm wrong, what can we do?
@dosinga that's the attitude
@dsturnbull one of those seems slightly different to the others... can't quite put my finger on it...
My daughter, on Bob Marley: "my head doesn't like it but my feet love it"
@19emtuck @gelnior only similarity is that they do validation. Schema definitions are very different.
5. AirPort Utility can't find the TimeCapsule...that it is connected to... https://t.co/zaAffEnsuB
4. AirDrop does not work. Again, nothing shows up, no errors, no debugging, nothing.
3. Home Sharing just ... does not work. No way to debug, just... nothing shows up.
2. Can't backup iPad because the previous non-existent backup is corrupted... https://t.co/6EbwvEkQyq
1. TimeMachine backups stopped working. No error, no way to fix it. Restarting TimeCapsule "fixed" it for a day.
I think I'm going Android. Litany of issues with the "Apple" ecosystem today...
Holy shit. This is bananas: https://t.co/K4nlUOzpJt and https://t.co/uYINcwep6A
@themaninblue That is super cool! Presentation feature?
@jaqx0r How good is it living in the future?!
After using Mac's for so long, you forget just how damn fast using a Linux GUI is. Ugly, but so so fast.
@danieljbaird Do you play Titanfall? What platform?
As seen on HN: SAML = Security & Authentication Mega cLusterfuck
@jgautheron Brilliant, thanks!
Today's thing I thought I would never see: Anthony Hopkins in a Michael Bay Transformer's movie. Because $$ I guess.
@flo711 How crazy is that?
@jgautheron I don't think the directory<->package name matching is correct for https://t.co/cGYz2IzhN1 ... there are "main"s though...
Listening to Demon Days again. I'd forgotten just how amazing this whole album is.
@danieljbaird It's nuts. I earn a pretty decent wage, but nowhere near enough to afford something decent in Sydney :\

@swartkrans @mattpodwysocki @golang @golang @reactivex it works using generated code. It is not ideal.
Very nice. A full ECMAScript 5.1 interpreter in Go: https://t.co/zhb2GO6DOU Used Otto in the past, but the code is complex, and unmaintained
@tobstarr no, but I've wanted one
@tirsen it's not the best, that's for sure, but it's tolerable
@tirsen Panics show a full stack trace, errors do not.
@jaqx0r as NTPMan that is your right
@rgbkrk Aaah, yes! That was *the* driving factor behind Kingpin's design. Glad you like it.
@rgbkrk Thank you. Do you mean you prefer them because of my pragmatic approach, or something else?
Last Titanfall 1 PUG tonight. The feels. Thanks for 2+ years of awesomeness @Titanfallgame .
View from our balcony at Elephant Nature Park. 5am elephant alarm anticipated. Worth it. https://t.co/qo7ggbs9p6
@dsturnbull yeah, pretty interesting. It's the runtime that makes it popular not the language. Weird.
"Can't backup because the backup is corrupt"... Another iTunes classic.
Stack Overflow's Community Wiki answers turn clean, succinct answers into convoluted treatises on the meaning of life.
Things that parents hate: daylight saving.
@FlakfireGaming Are you going to narrate an episodic BF1 walkthrough? That would be amazing!
@tnarg I did not expect that.
@sgleague (would need good Internet access)
@SGLeague Friends and I are interested in getting together for a day+night to play Titanfall 2. Do you guys know of anywhere we could hire?
Co-worker on Java: "for something named after coffee it's a real downer"
@danieljbaird Yeah DigitalOcean is really nice.
@danieljbaird You couldn't pay me enough to use Oracle IaaS.
Saw Mei at Comic Con. Resisted the urge to punch her.
My daughter lives Comic Con more than I do. So many costumes.
I think @PayPal make their non-logged-in form as irritating as possible to get you to sign up. It's like a time warp back to the 90's.
@jonshiring @titanfallgame Sorry, PC. Similar a few times in the past. It's been laggy on and off for the last day or two.
@Titanfallgame @jonshiring the AU Titanfall 1 servers are lagging again :(
This issue on adding a sort.Slice() function to Go is almost the definition of bike shedding: https://t.co/iWlTuqfTmY 😡
@uFlixDNS Hulu is not working again, on primary or secondary Australian server.
@jaqx0r @damienmiller Looks like I’m going to have to roll my own security product… https://t.co/RHNHHJ3FYi
@jaqx0r @damienmiller Yeah it is in the same space, but similar issues with lack of audits (https://t.co/CKyBuYXUo1 is … weird).
@damienmiller NP, thanks anyway :)
@damienmiller But as you say, it’s hard to know how secure these things are without some kind of audit.
@damienmiller Do you know of any good open source solutions for managing credentials in production?
@oriallon What the?!

https://t.co/6QiygfNC5R is the best Go vendoring tool out there.

There’s something entrancing about the composition of this photograph by Carol Highsmith. https://t.co/eMmTk0tww1
@15characterlimi check the reviews... Many issues
@gakman I think it’s deliberate to encourage upgrades to new monitors. Worked with me (but not to Apple), I couldn’t stand the snow anymore.
The Apple DisplayPort to Dual-Link DVI adapter has to be the worst piece of technology I’ve ever owned. Constant snow, random disconnects.
The last two @Qantas flights have been epic fail. NYC->LAX cancelled, put on a red eye with a 4 year old. Now QF12 is delayed by 4 hours.
The LA suburbs are what I imagine hell is like.
@dsturnbull how amazing is that?! So good.
The Eagle has Landed Again! I just experienced the Apollo 11 lunar landing minute-by-minute. Check it out at https://t.co/Hj90o5SYhi!
@naz_erkan I’m in NY. It’s still awesome for a soul refresher, don’t worry :)
@naz_erkan With those ingredients; almost certainly :P
